channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Lukas Storyteller
channel.desc: Anna, Agnes, Peter and Paul train for a baseball match, and things get off to a rough start. But when Noah shares the story of St. Joseph, it helps them to imitate his example and learn the virtue of obedience. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary For Kids
channel.desc: The Little Angel leads kids through the Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary from Jesus' first Miracle at Cana to the Institution of the Eucharist at the Last Supper. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, explains how the Holy Spirit reveals the true and magnificent beauty behind God?s perfect, passionate, and unconditional love. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch welcomes Fr. William J. Slattery, Ph.D. to discuss modernity?s failed worldview, how Catholics have responded, and how to rediscover a truly Catholic worldview. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Baptism of Christ, Wedding at Cana, Proclamation of the Kingdom, Transfiguration and Institution of the Eucharist help us to receive the graces of salvation from Christ through Mary's intercession. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grab Your Catechism With Fr. Connor
channel.desc: Fr. Connor explains that the whole of Scripture, which was written by God through human authors, speaks of Christ and teaches the message of his truth to all who would receive it. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Blessed Dominic of the Blessed Sacrament and his special love for the sick and the priesthood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Philosophers' Bench
channel.desc: While modern thinking often forces humanities to take a backseat to the sciences, Dr. Kreeft and Dr. Howard advocates that art, music, and other subjects are just as vital to our human identity. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Families struggling with miscarriage and difficult changes reveal how they found peace with the Lord's help. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch welcomes Fr. William J. Slattery, Ph.D. to discuss modernity?s failed worldview, how Catholics have responded, and how to rediscover a truly Catholic worldview. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Long Road Of Fr. Domenico From Cese To Turin
channel.desc: Paul Badde goes on-location throughout Italy to tell the life story of Fr. Domenico da Cese, a close friend of St. Padre Pio. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Fr. Mark and the Franciscan Friars of the Eternal Word are back. Interviews, spiritual insights from the friars, music videos and much more. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Syria, In The Middle Of Ashes
channel.desc: The battle for Aleppo was one of the deadliest in the war in Syria. Aleppo is a microcosm of the war that devastated the country. Out of a population of 18 million people, more than 13 million are in need of humanitarian assistance. Children are most at risk and in distress, suffering from disease and malnutrition, forced to work, marrying early, subjected to abuse and forced to become child soldiers. In the midst of this humanitarian crisis, Christians are suffering twice: from the general instability caused by the war and from targeted attacks on Christian communities by jihadist militants determined to eradicate the Christian presence. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris explains the dangers and increasing pervasiveness of witchcraft and the occult. Rev. Msgr. Stephen J. Rossetti, an exorcist with the Archdiocese of Washington, joins. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints Blessed Miriam Teresa Demjanovich
channel.desc: The short, impactful life of Teresa Demjanovich. Michael O?Neill presents the case for canonization for this Sister of Charity, which includes the only known cure of bilateral macular degeneration. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about apostolic succession from St. Peter, why purgatory exists when sins are forgiven in Confession, and how venial sins weaken relationship with God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: True Devotion To Mary
channel.desc: Fr. Frederick Miller discusses how Mary helps us in our struggles against the devil and sin. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica lends her wisdom and insight into the subject of Purgatory and God's will. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Kris McGregor continues the discussion about sanctity and the royal road to Heaven, describing the companions we have along the way, and how they assist us in life in Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: EWTN Pro-Life Weekly is a half-hour news and commentary program that covers life issues including abortion, assisted suicide, in vitro fertilization, highlighting the mercy of a culture of life, from a Catholic perspective. This program features interviews, analysis, and actionable steps for viewers to defend the dignity of every human person from conception to natural death. Hosted by Abigail Galv?n. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Great Britain On Location
channel.desc: Fr. Armand de Malleray explains his mission to strengthen Catholic identity and bring Catholic families closer to the faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: In Concert: Religions United In Music
channel.desc: The Jerusalem Symphony Orchestra performs to honor the 30th Anniversary of diplomatic relations between the Holy See and Israel, and the reconstruction of the Basilica of St. Paul. (70 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Journey With Carlo
channel.desc: The impact of Blessed Carlo Acutis is felt in the lives of the young people who knew him well. Hear the first-hand accounts from friends and family who paint a poignant picture of this remarkable young man. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mission To Educate
channel.desc: A history of the Catholic education system in St. Louis, which earned the nickname the ?Rome of the West? after religious communities began flocking to the city to help teach. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Long Road Of Fr. Domenico From Cese To Turin
channel.desc: Paul Badde goes on-location throughout Italy to tell the life story of Fr. Domenico da Cese, a close friend of St. Padre Pio. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Global Divine Mercy Chaplet
channel.desc: Children from around the world pray the Chaplet of Divine Mercy. (30 minutes).[(96057)]
